title: How to Make Barley Porridge

steps.headline: Bring the water to a boil in a saucepan.
steps.description: Wash the pearl barley if you haven't already done so.

steps.headline: Add the cup of pearl barley to the boiling water.
Simmer for 1 to 3 hours.
steps.description: The consistency needs to turn to porridge. Top up the water as needed and stir now and then.

steps.headline: Remove from the heat.
steps.description: Serve. It can be served as is or be accompanied by stewed fruit, fresh fruit slices and berries, cream or lemon sauce.

text: Bring the water to a boil in a saucepan. Wash the pearl barley if you haven't already done so. Add the cup of pearl barley to the boiling water. Add the salt if using. Simmer for 1 to 3 hours. The consistency needs to turn to porridge. Top up the water as needed and stir now and then. Remove from the heat. Serve. It can be served as is or be accompanied by stewed fruit, fresh fruit slices and berries, cream or lemon sauce.
